item.title: Prayer bpn12439 in Namibia
item.description: Vyashiri na kutanta, lino ndyo liyuva omo nga u vhura udjuni kukukeya Shipara, nakuyuvha Lijwi lyaMutwenyidirwa. Lijwi lyaKarunga linayuvhiki, ano shite shaShipara Shendi shina twedere pawiru yavantu. Vya wapera kehe muntu mukudongonona po mukoka wankango yavinyami pavitafure vyamumushima wendi, nakuteghelikida namaghano ghamawa nagha ghamawa ghakupira ghoma paviyivito vyaLihoramo lyendi, vineghedo vyaLitumo lyendi, naviyivito vyashikoda Shendi. Oh, anwe vana vamuntu! Shitambo shantamekero osho sha karo naMapuliro ghaKarunga naGhukareli wendi, kwa kara mukukunga vihepa vyavantu namukutwara kughuto ume wapo, namukuhuguvara mpepo yashihoro nakushepashepa mukatji ka wantu.
